about_the_game:
💛 A visual novel game about being in a game show that requires audience participation to finish.

💛 Are you tired of story games with only one end? Do you hate people who spoil the endings of games? And would you like to be a key part of the production of something? Well, allow this game to grace you with its presence.

💛 Gold Rush is a game about being in a game show (hehe, a game within a game) where the most popular contestant wins. The game is in development that requires votes to continue and then eventually finish it.

💛 What to expect 💛

💛 A mostly, if not almost entirely, LGBTQ+ cast (seriously! Aside from staff, there's only 1 cishet contestant!)
💛 A non-binary (and trixic ace!) protagonist, who you can give a custom name too!
💛 A demo that explains the plot and the concept of the game
💛 A link at the end of the game (and at the start AND end of the demo) that goes to a Tumblr site, which has a poll, which is important to develop the story!
💛 Long chapters to make up for the time it takes to develop it.

Have fun!

name: Gold Rush
short_description: A visual novel styled choice game where you decide the ending
